description: An advanced version of the Jegan developed by the Earth Federation in U.C. 0096. It`s used as an anti-ship assault type mobile suit. It has additional armor, boosters and weapons such as missile pods mounted on its shoulders, a hyper bazooka, the same type of beam rifle as used by the ReZEL (below) and dual 30mm machine guns.
name: RGM-89S Stark Jegan
